text: Gang - looking to setup a sync meeting early next week on updated design thinking and timing - can we get a 1 hour "download and working dialogue session" on the calendar for Monday/Tuesday ?  I blocked Tuesday for the day so perhaps we workin early morning Tues ??

Hey Marc... a few of us will be out of office next Tuesday (Joel + I), which is ok, but thought I should mention it.  We set up a time for an initial review of the design deck for 5 on Monday, if you'd like to be invited to that? Otherwise, looking at calendars, seems like the best time on Tuesday would be 9:30-10:30 or 10:00-11:00
yes please invite me for the Monday session

Deck is one thing - I'd like to get tapped into the weekly design review/update sessions if those are being scheduled - have some pending meetings that I'll need to be very clear on regarding updated design, MVP features and timing outline(s)....  please include me - thanks
Thanks! and invited! We don't have weekly design review/update sessions scheduled as of yet, but now that we having some resources available to us, I'll try and find a weekly time for us all to meet
